content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://influencermarketingawards.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/01/ashley-evans.jpeg” alt=”Jane van Wyngaarden – Marketing Manager , MSL UK” title_text=”Ashley Evans” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ border_radii=”on|100%|100%|100%|100%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

“As a beauty brand we’re hugely passionate about influencer marketing, investing our time and resources into creating really exciting and impactful campaigns that feature a wide level of tiered creators. For us to win Gold for Best Health & Beauty campaign with special recognition for our efforts in sustainability from industry judges is really important to us, and we feel proud to have been recognized by the IMS community for best-in-class influencer campaigns.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Ashley Evans, Senior Director, Digital Marketing at Eva NYC

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://influencermarketingawards.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/01/rahul-titus.jpeg” title_text=”Rahul Titus” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ border_radii=”on|100%|100%|100%|100%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

“The IMA is the gold standard for the influencer Marketing and allows us to not only benchmark against the industry but set new standards of what we know influencer marketing can achieve. Being the most awarded agency for the last 4 years, especially when in such talented company, validates our ambition to continuously innovate and drive real purpose in the industry. It also importantly reassures our clients that Ogilvy’s default is creative excellence as well as driving results. Looking forward to seeing more inspirational work next year!”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Rahul Titus, Global Head of Influence at Ogilvy

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://influencermarketingawards.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2021/01/dave-murray.jpeg” alt=”Dave Murray, Managing Director of rewardStyle, Europe” title_text=”Dave Murray” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ border_radii=”on|100%|100%|100%|100%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

“The IMAs are the industry’s flagship moment of recognition, championing innovative and visionary campaigns that deliver real impact. We are especially proud to have won in the category that rewards true effectiveness and recognises the value of investing in influencer marketing success.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Dave Murray, Managing Director at LTK Europe

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://influencermarketingawards.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/01/Dominic-Ivison.jpeg” title_text=”Dominic Ivison” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ border_radii=”on|100%|100%|100%|100%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

“Winning Best Influencer Marketing Technology and Industry Choice of SaaS at the 2022 Influencer Marketing Awards showed that the Influencer Marketing industry really values innovation. To have a panel of esteemed judges and the wider industry vote for ThisThat was a huge honour and validated our beliefs that we are at the forefront of campaign measurement and strategic insight. The wins were thanks to the team we have, and being able to celebrate with them meant the world to us. With the exposure provided by Hello Partner, The Influencer Marketing Awards and subsequent industry press we were put in the limelight which elevated ThisThat even further and led to more partnerships and continued growth for the company.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Dominic Ivison, Co-Founder at ThisThat

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
